parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the product's friendly name, identifier and version. In Arma 3 it also returns branch identifier, whether or not the game was launched using mods, and the platform.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''productVersion''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]
* [[String]] - Product Name
* [[String]] - Product Name Short
* [[Number]] - Product Version Number
* [[Number]] - Product Build Number
* [[String]] (Arma 3) - Product Branch
* [[Boolean]] (Arma 3) - Product is launched using mods [[true]] or vanilla [[false]]
* [[String]] (Arma 3) - Platform (''"Windows"'', ''"Linux"'' or ''"OSX"'')
* [[String]] (Arma 3) - Architecture - '''x64''' for 64bit or '''x86''' for 32bit '''Since version 1.67'''
</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[productVersion]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>would return ["Arma 2 OA", "arma2oa", 162, 95208] on Arma 2 OA 1.62.95208</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[productVersion]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>["Arma 3","Arma3",137,128764,"Development",false,"Windows"]</value></part></template></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[format]] ["%1.%2",([[productVersion]][[a_hash_b|#]]2)/100 [[toFixed]] 2,([[productVersion]][[a_hash_b|#]]3)]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns version e.g.: "2.00.146773"</value></part></template></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[supportInfo]], [[requiredVersion]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
